portfolio.name: Artem Kozlov
portfolio.title: 3rd Year Computer Science Student
portfolio.specialization: I specialize in full-stack development, IT support and love cybersecurity.
portfolio.descriptionText:
Hi, I'm Artem a third-year Computer Science student with a focus on cybersecurity.

My background as an Infanteer in the Canadian Army built my discipline, adaptability, and team-first mindset qualities I now bring to every tech challenge. I thrive in fast-paced environments, solving problems with logic and precision.

Fluent in English, French, Ukrainian, and Russian, I collaborate seamlessly across teams. Outside of tech, my work as a freelance sports and automotive photographer sharpened my eye for detail and ability to deliver under pressure.

Whether itâ€™s coding, leading, or learning, I bring focus, resilience, and a drive for smart solutions.
